recommendations.title: Enable TLS 1.2 Support
recommendations.description: TLS 1.2 is not supported, which is a critical security issue
recommendations.action: Configure CloudFront to support TLS 1.2 minimum

recommendations.title: Improve Overall Security Score
recommendations.description: Security score is 0/100, below recommended threshold
recommendations.action: Address the security issues identified in this report

recommendations.title: Enable TLS 1.3 Support
recommendations.description: TLS 1.3 provides improved security and performance
recommendations.action: Update CloudFront security policy to TLSv1.2_TLSv1.3_2021

recommendations.title: Enable Perfect Forward Secrecy
recommendations.description: Perfect Forward Secrecy not detected in cipher suites
recommendations.action: Ensure cipher suites support ECDHE or DHE key exchange

recommendations.title: CloudFront Security Policy Recommendation
recommendations.description: Use the latest CloudFront security policy for optimal security
recommendations.action: Set CloudFront security policy to TLSv1.2_TLSv1.3_2021 or newer
